entry.title: Cadbury Dairy Milk Orange Giant Buttons UK - 95g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.99

Dairy Milk with a Citrusy Twist!

     Imported directly from the UK, here's a Dairy Milk treat you're bound to adore! Orange Giant Buttons have the same silky smooth Dairy Milk chocolate texture you've come to love, with the added touch of real orange oil. Let each button coat your tongue in the beautiful blend of chocolate and fruity citrus flavour, it's an irresistible combination.

     Get this as a gift for any orange chocolate lover or share the joy with friends and family, we guarantee smiles all around no matter how this sweet is enjoyed!

95g | 1 peg bag

entry.title: Cadbury Dairy Milk Mini Eggs Bars - 100g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.99

Dairy Milk x Mini Eggs

     Mini Eggs are not just for Easter, any true Canadian knows this. They're great for munching, baking, gifting, and now they're all nice and cozy inside their new nest -  a Cadbury Milk Chocolate bar!

     Each piece of rich, smooth, and creamy milk chocolate is packed with delicious Mini Eggs. Let the chocolate melt and have all the eggs gather on your tongue or just chow down, however you decide to enjoy these bars, they're the perfect solution for your sweet tooth!

     This is the hottest collab of the decade, so don't miss out on all the delicious yumminess!

Try all the Dairy Milk Chocolate Bars

100g | 1 bar

entry.title: Cadbury Curly Wurly Bars - 4 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.69

Cadbury Curly Wurly Candy Bars

Many have asked, "What is a Curly Wurly"?

Well, the Curly Wurly Candy Bar is a braided, soft and chewy caramel covered in a thin layer of rich Cadbury milk chocolate. This sounds simple but it is divinely exquisite! Curly Wurly is eight inches of sweet, stretchy strands of caramel paired with bits of chocolate.                                                                    

Every bite of Cadbury Curly Wurly Candy is perfect!

The Curly Wurly chocolate bar used to be known as "Wig Wag Chocolate Bar" in Canada, and "Marathon Bar" in the US. There was also a German version of this bar called "3 Musketeers" and the Dutch called it "Leckerschmecker".
This delicious bar was designed by John Parfitt, a researcher at the Bournville Cadbury factory in the UK. While he was experimenting with some leftover toffee, the Curly Wurly was born!
Little did he know that the world would fall in love with his experiment!
The Curly Wurly chocolate bar made its debut in 1970, and although it's been called many different names, one thing remains, it is simply delicious!
"Chewy and curly, wavy and wurly! A swirly ladder of golden caramel, draped in Cadbury milk chocolate – everyone’s favourite twisty treat."
  • Made in the UK
  • Gluten-Free

 26 g Bars | 4 Pack

Ingredients:

Glucose syrup, sugar, palm oil, skimmed MILK powder, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, whey permeate powder (from MILK), MILK fat, emulsifiers (E471, sunflower lecithin, E442, E476), salt, flavourings, sodium hydrogen carbonate.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to produce labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.
